page.description: The CShortTime() function converts a short time value into a character value (string) that can be used in a sort expression. Format is 0h0m0s3.

argument.name: shorttime
argument.description: A short time value. For example: 09:27:16 91 am

page.discussion: Returns a character string representation of a short time value that can be sorted. The format is hhmmssP.
page.example:
dim st as Y st = now() ? st = 09:38:35 80 am
? cshorttime(st) = "093835803"
